General.Name: Hongfa Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Hongfa Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and supplies relays, medium and low voltage electrical appliances, high and low voltage complete equipment, connectors, capacitors, precision parts, and automation equipment worldwide. The company offers industrial, power, latching, automotive, signal, high voltage DC, high frequency relays, as well as relay sockets and modules; and low-voltage devices, such as control appliance, distribution appliance, and terminal apparatus. It also provides film capacitor application, such as reactive compensation, AC filter, lighting, telecommunication, home appliance, power supply, industrial controls, etc.; industrial robot and automatic production lines; vacuum interrupters, power connectors, transformers, and electronic modules; and vacuum pumps and snap-action switches. The company was formerly known as WuHan LiNuo Solar Energy Group Co., Ltd. lHongfa Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Xiamen, China.
General.Address: No.90-101 Sunban South Road, Xiamen, China, 361021
